Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: People across Australia are eagerly awaiting the Federal Budget set to be handed down tonight by Treasurer Jim Chalmers amidst hopes for a surplus aged care funding mental health initiatives and women's safety funding. Independent crossbenchers have expressed interest in considering the budget based on its merits and overall there is an air of positivity and anticipatory energy as people await the potential impact of the budget on their everyday lives. Craig James has provided an update on the share market while Laura Jayes has previewed the budget and the impact of inflation and cost of living measures.
